content: stitch by stitch we re making history patriotic hat pattern hats for harris crochet designed by emily korff description hats for harris is a fiber arts community-driven initiative aimed at supporting kamala harris and tim walz as they champion social change and equality as we prepare for the upcoming women s march on november 2nd 2024 we invite everyone of all skill levels to join us in creating vibrant handmade hats that symbolize unity empowerment and our commitment to progress whether you knit for yourself or donate a hat for someone attending the march every stitch counts in making a powerful statement let s come together share our passion for knitting and make a difference finished size abbreviations length 11 inches single_crochet = single_crochet us terms height 8
